valid: For the period 18:00 (UTC) on Mon 1 Dec 2025 to 18:00 (UTC) on Tue 2 Dec 2025
general_synopsis: Atlantic low 964 moving slowly east, expected Rockall 976 by midday tomorrow. New low expected north of Viking 978 by same time

Cyclonic, mainly southerly or southeasterly, 6 to gale 8, perhaps severe gale 9 later, becoming southwesterly 4 to 6 later.

Rain or showers.

Good, occasionally poor.
